titleStmt.title: A vindication of the proceedings of His Majesties ecclesiastical commissioners, against the Bishop of London and the fellows of Magdalen-College
titleStmt.author: Care, Henry, 1646-1688.
Hedges, Charles, Sir, 1649 or 50-1714.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Tho. Milbourn, and published by Richard Janeway ...,

notesStmt.note: Authorship attributed to H. Care; sometimes attributed to C. Hedges. Cf. NUC pre-1956; BM; Wing.
The only variation between copies in positions 22 and 23 on Reel 376 consists of a different catchword on p. 8 in each copy.
Reproduction of original in Newberry Library and Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
